name: Bean Spawner 3 | Beanstorm Madness
description: You play as David the bean (again) But you have competition... But this wont last for long.. Not only you have the power of the Beangod on your side with your cross, but you also can summon MASSIVE Beanstorms by pressing O, Spawn dead meme soldiers by pressing E, And claim territory by pressing F. Parkour and explore this town in Beanland! How much bean. Can you bean?
